txt.en: The road to the Bonfire Glade lies just beyond the Old Forest Tunnel on the eastern border of Buckland.\n\nShirriff Hob Hayward has asked you to set up jars of foul-smelling brew along the road to ward off aggressive wildlife.
DNT - 'Many thanks! I can't say it'll be pleasant venturing to the Bonfire Glade for the time being, but better safe than sorry.'
'Many thanks! I can't say it'll be pleasant venturing to the Bonfire Glade for the time being, but better safe than sorry.'
Shirriff Hob Hayward is guarding the Buckland Gate in Buckland.\n\nYou should let him know that you've set up the jars in the Old Forest.

'Wolves attacked you on the way to the Bonfire Glade? I'd wager they were as panicked as the other animals we've seen.\n\n'At any rate... I can't say it'll be pleasant venturing into the forest for the time being, but better safe than sorry.'
The Bounders find themselves perplexed over the sudden aggression of the Old Forest wildlife.

'Hoy there, stranger! I'll warn you right now, you ought to stay away from the Old Forest. The beasts there are all riled up -- they've even gone and attacked hobbits near the Old Forest Tunnel.

'But... hold on, you seem like the adventuring sort. Think you could lend us a hand? Us Bounders came up with a brew of sorts that'll dissuade most things from approaching. All you need to do is set up these jars along the road to the Bonfire Glade.

'It'll take a while for the smell to set in, so don't drop your guard in the forest! And... don't breathe in too deeply.'
Place jars along the road to the Bonfire Glade ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
